archetypes.name: Alchemist
archetypes.description: The ALCHEMIST specializes in powerful buffing Vials and consumable potency.
archetypes.location: Any Dran overland area (Ironborough / Brocwithe Quarter / Morrow Parish / Lemark District)
archetypes.unlock: Approach every sewer drain on the edge of any of the Dran overland areas until you get grabbed by a Manticora. Once you load into the new area, defeat the white Manticora

archetypes.name: Archon
archetypes.description: The ARCHON is the master of Weapon Mods and Mod Power generation.
archetypes.unlock: To Unlock the Red Door you will need the following. Engram Explorer with skill Fortune Hunter (LV10), Engram Invader with skill Worm Hole (LV5), Armor set Realmwalker, Relic Consumable Void Heart, Leto's Amulet, Amber Moonstone, Black Cat Band, Zanias Malice, Anastasijas Inspiration, Cube Gun, Ford's Scattergun, Labyrinth Staff. With all this the door will open.

archetypes.name: Challenger
archetypes.description: The CHALLENGER specializes in close range combat and heightened survivability.
archetypes.unlock: Buy from Reggie at Ward 13 for 1500 Scrap

archetypes.name: Engineer
archetypes.description: The ENGINEER specializes in Heavy Weaponry which can be carried or placed in turret mode.
archetypes.location: Any overland area (The Eon Vault / Abyssal Rift / Phantom Wasteland / Timeless Horizon)
archetypes.unlock: Found just out of bounds in either of the two overland areas you roll on N'Erud. For an easier time locating this item try using the Explorer Archtype's skill "Fortune Hunter" to highlight the item in the fog.

archetypes.name: Explorer
archetypes.description: The EXPLORER spcializes in finding valuable items and overall team utility.

archetypes.name: Gunslinger
archetypes.description: The GUNSLINGER specializes in raw damage, firearm handling, and ammo conservation.
archetypes.unlock: Listen to 20 total Mudtooth stories in Ward 13 after finishing your second world in campaign mode

archetypes.name: Handler
archetypes.description: The HANDLER specializes in teamwork in both solo and cooperative scenarios.
archetypes.unlock: Buy from Mudtooth at Ward 13 for 1500 Scrap

archetypes.name: Hunter
archetypes.description: The HUNTER specializes in ranged damage, precision shots and marking enemies.
archetypes.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13 for 1500 Scrap

archetypes.name: Invader
archetypes.description: The INVADER specializes elusiveness nad misdirecting the enemy's focus.
archetypes.unlock: Use the "Walker's Dream" item and defeat the "Bane" abberation. To get the "Walker's Dream" item use the Dreamcatcher melee weapon on the sleeping walker special enemy (glowing blue) in an area just off the main path between the Corrupted Harbour and Blackened Citadel checkpoint.

archetypes.name: Medic
archetypes.description: The MEDIC specializes in survivability with enhanced healing and Relic effectiveness.
archetypes.unlock: Buy from Dr. Norah at Ward 13 for 1500 Scrap

archetypes.name: Summoner
archetypes.description: The SUMMONER specializes in using Minions to do their bidding and sacrificing them.
archetypes.unlock: Available at the Bloodmoon Altar for 15 Bloodmoon Essence. Acquire Bloodmoon Essence from killing Root Wisps during a bloodmoon (red moon in sky) in any of Yaesha's outside areas

traits.unlock: Find the secret area at the back left (need to drop down), and activate the fail safe protocol (Co-Op, one player recieving the trait needs to stay outside)

mods.name: Hotshot
mods.description: Imbues ammunition with FIRE and increases Ranged damage by 15% for 20.3s. Shots also apply BURNING, dealing 300.8 FIRE Damage over 10s. Mod Power Req: 1,250

mods.name: Healing Shot
mods.description:
Launches a payload that explodes on cotact with allies, healing 35% of their max health. When no ally is struck, payload lays dormant until an ally gets close. Dorman payload lasts 30s slowly losing healing potency over time.
Mod Power Req: 600

mods.name: Concussive Shot
mods.description:
Fires a focused blast of air through all targets within 8m dealing 155 damage and 4x impact.
Mod Power Req: 450

mods.name: Scrap Shot
mods.description:
Fires a caltrops grenade that explodes to cover area of 6m. Caltrops deal 20 damage per second and apply SLOW to enemies that walk over them. Lasts 10s.
Mod Power Req: 750

mods.name: Voltaic Rondure
mods.description:
Launches a slow-moving orb that pulses every 0.5s, striking enemies within 3m for 20s SHOCK damage and applying OVERLOADED for 15s. The orb lasts 20s. The orb can be overcharged by striking it with additional damage.
Mod Power Req: 850

mods.name: Space Crabs
mods.description:
Launch an alien egg that bursts on impact, releasing 5 Space Crabs. Crabs follow the caster, leaping towards the enemies within 4m, and exploding, dealing 60 Damage each.
Mod Power Req: 450

mods.name: Prismatic Driver
mods.description:
Fires a superheated beam which deals 25 Mod Damage per second. Sustaining the beam on a target causes an explosion which deals 150 Mod damage in a 3m AOE.
Mod Power Req: 50 Per Pulse

mods.name: Tremor
mods.description:
Fires a projectile that cracks the ground and spawns shockwaves that deal 75 damage within 9m for 6s. Shockwaves inflict 3x impact.
Mod Power Req: 900

mods.name: Fargazer
mods.description:
Calls froth an eye of Legion to gaze at player's AIM target. For every 0.25s Fargazer focuses on a traget within 25m, a stack of MADNESS Status is applied for 5s. Each stack deals 3 Damage per second. Max 10 stacks. Lasts 30s.
Mod Power Req: 1,250

mods.name: Witchfire
mods.description:
Fires a highly volatile projectile that explodes to leave a line of flaming terrain. Deals 55 FIRE damage per second, and applies BURNING, dealing 200 damage over 10s. Lasts 5s.
Mod Power Req: 750

mods.name: Rotted Arrow
mods.description:
Fires a rotten arrow that deals 19.8 damage and detonates for another 60 damage within 4m. A deadly gas cloud is left behind that deals 200 damage over 5s.
Mod Power Req: 400

mods.name: Overflow
mods.description:
Imbues ammunition with SHOCK and increases Fire Rate by 15% and Reload Speed by 15% for 20s. Shots also apply OVERLOADED, dealing 87.5 SHOCK Damage every 5s for 15s.
Mod Power Req: 1,250

mods.name: Soulbinder
mods.description:
Fires a projectile that attaches to the enemy dealing 40 damage. Enemies within 7m become bound to the primary target after impact and share 60% of damage dealt to them. Lasts 15s.
Mod Power Req: 650
mods.unlock: Compleating the quest reaching the bottom of the Chimney

mods.name: Time Lapse
mods.description:
Creates a 6m blast which freezes all standard enemies for 7s. Dealing damage to frozen enemies immediately breaks the Time Lapse effect, applying SLOW for the remaining duration.
Mod Power Req: 1,000
mods.unlock: Need to find the piece found in Lemark District, by using the same clock hour that the clock in Hewdas Clock. Then fix the clock in Hewdas Clock.

mods.name: Firestorm
mods.description:
Creates a whirling cyclone that sucks in nearby targets and applies BURNING for 10s. The center of the Cyclone deals 75 FIRE damage per second. Lasts 15s.
Mod Power Req: 1,250

mods.name: Helix
mods.description:
Shoots a helix of missiles, dealing 120 damage. On contact, divides into 6 smaller rockets which seek additional targets, dealing 30 damage on contact.
Mod Power Req: 850

mods.name: Astral Burst
mods.description:
Fires a short range burst of 7 star fragments which deal 35 damage each. Fragments bounce off walls up to 3 times, dealing 35% additional damage per bounce. Weakspot hits deal reduced damage.
Mod Power Req: 450
mods.unlock: From the entrance, the triangle lever should be triggered until the triangle is facing left. The icons lever should be triggered until the doe is in front of you. The circles lever should be triggered until the Ravager, doe and death are encircled with the doe having two circles.

mods.name: Blood Draw
mods.description:
Shoots out razor-sharp Chain Shards which impale up to 5 targets within 15m, dealing 10 damage. On hit, chains are pulled towards the caster, dealing 250 damage split equally among enemies and applying 275 BLEEDING damage over 15s.
Mod Power Req: 450
mods.unlock: Pay the tribute to the Red Prince

mods.name: Bore
mods.description:
Fires a drill projectile, dealing 80 damage. After burrowing into an enemy, creates a Weakspot which grants 50% of normal Weakspot Damage on hit. If attached to an existing Weakspot Ranged Crit Chance is increased by 15% when attacking the drill. Last 6s. 
Mod Power Req: 500

mods.name: Corrosive Rounds
mods.description:
Imbues ammunition with TOXIC and increases Range Crit Chance by 15% for 20s. Shots also apply CORRODED, dealing 150 damage over 10s.
Mod Power Req: 1,250

mods.name: Defrag
mods.description:
Infects weapon with Malware for 30s, causing shots to apply FRAGMENTED for 5s. When a FRAGMENTED enemy dies, they create a Glitch that lasts 5s.
Picking up a Glitch increases All damage by 20% for 5s.
Destroying a Glitch causes it to destabilize, creating a 5m Virus Pool which deals 25 damage per second and applies the FRAGMENTED debuff to enemies inside. Virus Pools last 15s.
Mod Power Req: 1,500

mods.name: Energy Wall
mods.description:
Deploys an energy barrier on impact with ground. Allies can shoot through Energy Wall but enemy projectiles are absorbed (up to 500 damage received). Max 1 Wall at a time. Lasts 30s.
Mod Power Req: 500
mods.unlock: Inside one of the towers of the overland. Take the elevator and it will be at the top of the statue that looks like the ones that holds the Seeker Keys

mods.name: Familiar
mods.description:
Summons Faerie Familiar to aid in combat. The Familiar selects a random enemy within 10m and slashes through them for 25 damage each attack. Familiar will select a new target when the previous one dies. Lasts 25s.
Mod Power Req: 500
mods.unlock: Use the Dreamcatcher on the Huntress while she is asleep. Then use the item to defeat her in her dream

mods.name: Rootlash
mods.description:
Launches a projectile which summons a Root Tentacle. Tentacles deal 30 damage and steal 1.5% of the hero's Max Health per hit. Lasts 20s. (Max 2)
Mod Power Req: 450

mods.name: Skewer
mods.description:
Fires a Wretched Spear which embeds itself on contact. Spears deal 150 damage on hit, rapidly dividing inside the target until bursting, dealing 350 damage to all targets within 3m. Spears embedded in the environment remain in place for 10s.
Mod Power Req: 500

mods.name: Song of Eafir
mods.description:
Fires a shot infused with the binding power of the Song of Eafir. Deals massive impact to all enemies in 10m and deals additional damage to Flying enemies. The song continues for 15s, afflicting targets within 15m with SLOW, and a 15% decrease to damage dealt.
Mod Power Req: 1,000
mods.unlock: After lowering the bridge to the Ravager's Lair and before defeating him, talk to The Flautist and you can hear he is playing a new tune. Play that tune on the water Harp to get the The Bolt Driver. 1-4-0-2-5-0-3-0 Then talk to him to be rewarded with the crafting material

mods.name: Stasis Beam
mods.description:
Fires a beam which deals 15 damage per second, and applies SLOW Debuff. After 3s of application to a target, SLOW becomes STASIS, freezing the target in place for 10s.
Mod Power Req: 50 per Pulse.
mods.unlock: While exploring the overland you will find a room with a door. Open it and use the elevator. Go through the cave killing zombies and at the end of the cave you can find the material.

mutators.name: Transpose
mutators.description:
Picking up Ammo increases Ranged damage by 10% for 20s. 
Level 10: Ammo pickups are added directly to the magazine.

mutators.name: Feedback
mutators.description:
Using this weapon's Mod generates 10% of single charge value as passive Mod Power over 10s. Does not stack.
Level 10: Mod Damage generates 10% of damage dealt as Mod Power.

mutators.name: Harmonizer
mutators.description:
Increases Mod Damage by 10%. 
Level 10: Generate 25% additional Mod Power for Stowed Weapon.

mutators.name: Resentment
mutators.description:
Gain 10% Melee Damage when Grey Health is present. 
Level 10: Reduces Stagger by 1 when using any Melee Attack.

mutators.name: Shield Breaker
mutators.description:
Melee Attacks grant a Shield for 2% of Max Health. Max 20%. Last 10s. 
Level 10: Charged Melee Attacks consume all Shield to increase damage of next strike by 1% per Shield Consumed. Max 100%.

mutators.name: Slayer
mutators.description:
Reloading increases the damage of this weapon's next shot by 10%. Lasts 3s. 
Level 10: Increases Reload Speed by 15%.

mutators.name: Weaponlord
mutators.description:
Basic Melee Attack increase the next Charge Attack by 7%. Max 5 Stacks. 
Level 10: At Max Stacks, the next Charge Attack gains 100% Critical Chance.

mutators.name: Dervish
mutators.description:
Increases Melee Damage by 20% for 10s when activating a Skill. 
Level 10: Melee kills reduce Skill Cooldowns by 5%. Can trigger once every 5s.

mutators.name: Deadly Calm
mutators.description:
Continuosly Aiming increases Ranged Damage by up to 10% over 3s. 
Level 10: Ranged Critical Hit Chance increased by 10%.

mutators.name: Battery
mutators.description:
Ranged Hits increase the next Weakspot Hit by 10% per stack. Max 5 Stacks. 
Level 10: At Max Stacks, the next Weakspot Hit deals 15% additional damage over 3s.

mutators.name: Timewave
mutators.description:
Mod Use applies SLOW status on all enemies within 7.5m for 3.5s.
Level 10: Increase this weapon's Ranged damage by 15% to enemies inflicted with SLOW status.

mutators.name: Refunder
mutators.description:
Shots from this weapon have 20% chance to return spent Ammo to reserves.
Level 10: Refunded Ammo has a 50% chance to also be added to stowed weapon reserves.

mutators.name: Momentum
mutators.description:
When this weapon scores a Critical hit, it increases Critical Chance and Critical Damage by 1.5% for 3s. Max 10 stacks.
Level 10: Critical Hits from this weapon add 2 stacks. Increases duration by 2s.

mutators.name: Lithely
mutators.description:
Increase this weapon's Reload Speed by 4% for each enemy killed between reloads. Lasts 15s. Max 5 Stacks.
Level 10: Reloading at Max Stacks increases Ranged Damage by 20% for 15s.
mutators.unlock: Defeat the Aberration Barghest the Vile.

mutators.name: Striker
mutators.description:
Melee Hits increase Melee Damage by 3% for 10s. Max 5 Stacks.
Level 10: Increases Movement Speed by 3% per stack.

mutators.name: Extender
mutators.description:
Increases Magazine Capacity of this weapon by 30%.
Level 10: Increases Reload Speed of this weapon by 15%

mutators.name: Bandit
mutators.description:
On hit, grants 10% chanche to return spent Ammo directly into the magazine of this weapon.
Level 10: When Ammo is returned to this weapon, it gains 10% increased Fire Rate for 3s. Duration can increase up to 10s
mutators.unlock: Defeat The Weald Stalker and The Gnarled Archer

mutators.name: Reinvigorate
mutators.description:
Reduces Stamina Cost of all Charged Melee Attacks by 25%.
Level 10: Melee Charge Attacks gain 15% additional damage and 10% Critical Chance.
mutators.unlock: Defeat Defiler Boss that spawns after killing Nexus Root with the imprissioned Pan

mutators.name: Bulletweaver
mutators.description:
Mod use increases Fire Rate of this weapon by 10% for 7s.
Level 10: Reloading from empty increases Mod Generation of this weapon by 15%. Lasts 7s.
mutators.unlock: Defeat Atrophy hidden boss. Found in the hidden library behind a pressure plated wall.

mutators.name: Failsafe
mutators.description:
Attached Mod deals 10% additional Mod Damage.
Level 10: Attached Mod use gains a 15% chace to not consume charge.
mutators.unlock: Don't kill any bugs in the area, instead run to the secret room and press the switch. That would kill all the bugs and make an Aberration appear.

mutators.name: Ghost Shell
mutators.description:
After 3 consecutive Weakspot Hits, increase the damage of the next Weakspot Hit by 20%.
Level 10: Increases Weakspot Critical Chance by 15%.
mutators.unlock: Up right in the area there will be a statue with the Doe and Ravager guarded by 2 Pan Warriors. Clear it and equip the Red Doe Sigil. At the front of the statue it will move revealing a hidden staircase leading to the Rotten Thaen Fruit, use it to get the Mutator.

mutators.name: Supercharger
mutators.description:
Increases Charge Speed of Bows and Fusion Rifles by 10%.
Level 10: Charged Primary Shots of Bows and Fusion Rigles gain 15% Critical Chance.
mutators.unlock: Use the "Walker's Dream" item and defeat the "Bane" abberation. To get the "Walker's Dream" item use the Dreamcatcher melee weapon on the sleeping walker special enemy (glowing blue) in an area just off the main path between the Corrupted Harbour and Blackened Citadel checkpoint.

mutators.name: Twisting Wounds
mutators.description:
Increases Ranged damage of this weapon by 10% to BLEEDING targets.
Level 10: This weapon's Ranged Weakspot and Ranged Critical Hits apply BLEEDING, dealing 100 BLEED damage over 10s.

mutators.name: Disengage
mutators.description:
Melee Strikes increase the damage of the next Backdash Evade Attack by 4%. Max 5 Stacks.
Lasts 7.5s.
Level 10: Perfect Neutral Evades grants 5 stacks

mutators.name: Misfortune
mutators.description:
Increase Melee damage by 5% for each unique Negative Status the target is suffering from.
Level 10: Melee Attacks apply SLOW for 2s.
mutators.unlock: In the Jester's Card event, choose the devil card. Defeat the Aberration that Spawns

mutators.name: Overdrive
mutators.description:
Melee Critical Hits increase Melee Critical Chance and Critical Damage by 5% for 7.5s. stacking up to 5 times.
Level 10: Melee Critical Strikes deal 20% additional damage.
mutators.unlock: Solve the Consort's Puzzle and loot the coffins after opening the door, then defeat the Aberration Wither

mutators.name: Steadfast
mutators.description:
Charged Melee Attacks cannot be interrupted and gain 10% damage reduction from all sources.
Level 10: All damage taken during Charged Melee Attack is covered to Grey Health.

mutators.name: Transference
mutators.description:
Melee Hits generate 5% Ammo Reserves for both Firearms. Cooldown 10s.
Level 10: When a Firearm reserve is full, melee Strikes generate 100% additional Mod Power ofr that weapon.
mutators.unlock: Defeat the Aberration Fetid Corpse. To access it you need to enter the pods that are at the last area.

mutators.name: Vampire Blade
mutators.description:
Increases Melee Damage by 10% while within 10m of a BLEEDING entity.
Level 10: Melee Hits vs BLEEDING targets will Lifesteal 3% of base damage dealt.

mutators.name: Vengeful Strike
mutators.description:
Increases Melee damage by 20% when below 50% Max Health.
Level 10: Increases Melee Critical Chance by 15% when below 50% Max Health.
mutators.unlock: Defeat the Aberration Bastion, just where you found the Labyrinth Staff

relics.name: Blooming Heart
relics.description: On use, heals the user for 35% of caster's Max Health over 5s. Spawns 3 Healing Orbs which grant 35% of caster's Max Health over 5s. Orbs last 20s. Recasting removes previous Orbs.
relics.unlock: There is a Vault inside an illusory wall, to solve it use the elevator outside but don't jump in. Once the elevator is up you can see the symbols you need.

relics.name: Crystal Heart
relics.description: On use, regenerates 100% of Max Health over 10s. Movement Speed is reduced by 50% and damage incoming is reduced by 25%. Lasts 10s.
relics.unlock: Reach the final area and turn the facility on.

relics.name: Decayed Heart
relics.description: On use, causes the next 3 instances of enemy damage taken to trigger 40 Health regeneration over 3s. Lasts 30s.

relics.name: Enlarged Heart
relics.description: Innate Double Use Speed. One use, heals 140 Health over 0.5s. Relic capacity is halved.
relics.unlock: Buy it from Cass after Defeating 6 World Bosses. Only counts if the boss is killed with the 2 different kills if they have it

relics.name: Lifeless Heart
relics.description: On use, heals 30 Health over 0.5s. Relic capacity is doubled.
relics.unlock: Eat the Fruit of Death 3 times, each time takes a bite until it breaks and gives you the Lifeless Heart.

relics.name: Pulsing Heart
relics.description: On use, pulses every 3s, healing allies within 7m for 23 Health over 0.5s per pulse. Lasts 15s.
relics.unlock: At the end of the dungeon there is a preassure plate that opens a wall, at the end of the maze there are some stairs that leads you to a jump. In that room at your left should be an illusory wall.

relics.name: Quilted Heart
relics.description: Does not provide standard healing. On use, negates Stamina Drain and cause Evades to heal for 15 Health over 0.25s. Lasts 20s.

relics.name: Reprocessed Heart
relics.description: On use, converts 5 Health as Grey Health to 40 Mod Power per second for 25s for both weapons. Cannot die from conversion.

relics.name: Resonating Heart
relics.description: On use, regenerates 50% of Max Health over 5s. When heal ends, any overhealed Health is Doubled and awarded over the next 20s.

relics.name: Ripened Heart
relics.description: On.use, heals 35 Health over 0.5s and an additional 70 over 5s.

relics.name: Runed Heart
relics.description: On use, increases Health Regeneration by 5 and generates 500 Mod Power over 10s for both weapons.

relics.name: Salvaged Heart
relics.description: Innate 50% Use Speed bonus. On use, heals 30 Health over 0.25s and restore 300% of current Grey Health.
relics.unlock: Crafted at Drzyr Replicator. 10 Lumenite Crystal, 15 Relic Dust, 1500 Scrap

relics.name: Shielded Heart
relics.description: On use, grants a SHIELD for 100% of Max Health. Lasts 20s or until SHIELD is removed by damage.
relics.unlock:
Find your way to the back of a statue that is located at the hall where E.D. Alpha is encountered to insert a Stellar-Powered Cell at the back of the statue, it's not reachable from the ground. You must make your way around to a higher level around the backside area of the statue, find an elevator, trigger it to go up but don't jump on it, it will reveal a hole underneath, jump down to access the slot and insert a Stellar-Powered Cell.
This will open a door on the side of the main hall, go through it.

relics.name: Siphon Heart
relics.description: On use, grants 10% of base damage dealt as Lifesteal for 10s.
relics.unlock: Give the Essence Echo to the Custiodian. For that you will need to defeat Tal Ratha.

relics.name: Tormented Heart
relics.description: Innate 20% Use Speed bonus. On use, deals 240 Explosive damage to enemies within 10m and Lifesteals 25% of damage dealt.
relics.unlock: Feed the Override Pin from N'Erud to the Nightweaver's Web.

relics.name: Tranquil Heart
relics.description: Passively grants 2 Health Regeneration per second. On use, doubles All Health Regeneration for 15s.
relics.unlock: Crafted by giving Nimue a Tormented Heart

relics.name: Unsullied Heart
relics.description: On use, heals for 100% of Current Health over 0.5s.
relics.unlock: While wearing the One True King Sigil, stand in front of the statue that wields a greatsword while you are in the Beatific Palace. Use the lever to change zone if needed.

relics.name: Void Heart
relics.description: On use, reduces incoming damage by 50% for 4s. When buff ends, heals 100% of missing Health over 0.75s.
relics.unlock: Custodian storyline on N'Erud, do not use the override pin, talk to him and wait ~12 real life hours for him to send the ship to Alepsis-Taura. If you don't see it go to Ward 13. You can change your system date to be one day forward and get it.

relics.name: Constrained Heart
relics.unlock: Buy it from Cass after Defeating 12 World Bosses. Only counts if the boss is killed with the 2 different kills if they have it

relics.name: Diverted Heart
relics.unlock: Buy it from Cass after Defeating 18 World Bosses. Only counts if the boss is killed with the 2 different kills if they have it

amulets.name: Gunfire Security Lanyard
amulets.description: Automatically reloads Magazine over time. Does not work for single shot weapons.
amulets.unlock: Become Ford

amulets.name: Emergency Switch
amulets.description: When below 50% Health, chance to consume Relic on use is reduced by 35%. Final Relic Charge is not consumed on use, but effect cannot be triggered again for 60s.
amulets.unlock: Found on a corpse

amulets.name: Samoflange
amulets.description: Direct damage taken from enemies, and any additional damage within 2s, is reduced by 50%. Once the defensive buff expires, all incoming damage to wearer is increased by 15% for 10s.
amulets.unlock: After collecting two Stellar-Powered Cells you will be able to open a new path an elevator that takes you to a secret room. Just when the elevator arrives, to the side you will find this Amulet.

amulets.name: Hallowed Egg
amulets.description: Spending at least 30% of a Firearm's magazine to deal damage increases Melee damage by 10% for 7s. Stacks 5x.
amulets.unlock: Defeat Root Nexus

amulets.name: Talisman of the Sun
amulets.description: Increases FIRE damage by 20% and BURNING damage by 50%.
amulets.location: The Expanding Glade / Forgotten Field / The Nameless Nest
amulets.unlock: Inside a chest at the feet of a statue

amulets.name: Inert Overcharger
amulets.description: Standing still increases Fire Rate by 20%, Reload Speed by 15%, and reduces Reeoil by 50%. Lasts 1.5s after moving.

amulets.name: Difference Engine
amulets.description: While a Shield is active, gain 20% damage and 1.5% of base damage dealt as Lifesteal.
amulets.unlock: From the coffins in the ground using the big facility you need to power first the Dark Conduit area.

amulets.name: Scavenger's Bauble
amulets.description: Increases Scrap pickups by 50%. Automatically pick up any nearby crafting materials.

amulets.name: Matriarch's Insignia
amulets.description: Increases Melee Damage by 35% and causes all sucesful Melee Attacks to restore 10 Stamina.
amulets.unlock: You need to open a door with a key you will find behind a waterfall

amulets.name: Gunslinger's Charm
amulets.description: Increases Fire Rate by 15% and Reload Speed by 20%.
amulets.unlock: Exahust dialoge with Mudtooth after finishing the second world

amulets.name: Weightless Weight
amulets.description: Increases Movement Speed by 0.75% and reduces Stamina Cost of all actions by 0.75% for every 5 points of Armor Encumbrance.

amulets.name: Indignant Fetish
amulets.description: Taking damage from enemies increases all damage dealt by 25% and reduces all incoming damage by 10%. Lasts 20s.

amulets.name: Spirit Wisp Amulet
amulets.description: Activating a Mod reduces current Skill Cooldowns by 3% for every 300 Mod Power spent.
amulets.unlock: Get the whisp and progress through the dungeon till the beginning.

amulets.name: Golden Ribbon
amulets.description: Increases Mod damage by 25%. Activating a Mod grants HASTE for 15s.
amulets.unlock: While the outside plate is in "light form" use the Plain Ribbon on the statue. Leave the location and return to get the amulet.

amulets.name: Rusted Navigator's Pendant
amulets.description: Grants 15 Health, 15 Stamina and -15 Armor Encumbrance

amulets.name: Laemir Censer
amulets.description: Increases Mod Duration by 50%. Increases Mod Cost by 15%
amulets.unlock: Exahust every dialoge with the Pan you rescue in the boss fight with Defiler.

amulets.name: Soul Anchor
amulets.description: Summoning increases all damage dealt by 20% for 30s.
amulets.unlock: Bloodmoon Altar need 10 Bloodmoon Essence

amulets.name: Ankh of Power
amulets.description: Grants 15% increase to all damage. Consuming a Relic doubles the bonus for 15s.

amulets.name: Dying Ember
amulets.description: Gain 5% of base Melee damage dealt as Lifesteal

amulets.name: Abrasive Whetstone
amulets.description: When attacking a BLEEDING enemy, Crit Chance is increased by 15% and Crit Damage is increased by 30%.
amulets.unlock: Buy it from Cass (RNG)

amulets.name: Broken Pocket Watch
amulets.description: Increases Stamina Regen by 25 and reduces Stamina cost by 50%
amulets.unlock: Buy it from Cass (RNG)

amulets.name: Butcher's Fetish
amulets.description: Increases Critical Chance by 15% and Critical Damage by 25% for 15s after striking enemy with a Charged Melee Attack.
amulets.unlock: Buy from Reggie after finishing 5 Worlds, inlcuding adventure ones.

amulets.name: Chains of Amplification
amulets.description: Increases all damage dealt to targets suffering from a Status Effect by 20%.

amulets.name: Cleansing Stone
amulets.description: Reduces Duration of Elemental Status Effects against wearer by 50%. Relic use cleanses Elemental Status effects and grants 15% of wearers Max Health to all allies within 7m when cleansed.
amulets.unlock: You will need to access a secret passage to find it.

amulets.name: Core Booster
amulets.description: Increases weakspot damage by 50% for 10s after killing an enemy.
amulets.unlock: Use Memory Core II in the secret area found in a hole at the left side of the entrance.

amulets.name: Daredevils Charm
amulets.description: Gain 7.5% to all damage dealt, 3% Movement Speed, and 5% all damage taker' for each piece of unequipped armor.
amulets.unlock: Buy it from Reggie after Hardcore mode beat Root Earth World.

amulets.name: Death Embrace
amulets.description: Gain 20% to all damage when Health is below 100%. Gain HASTE when below 50% Health.
amulets.unlock: Buy from Bedel of the Vaunnt 1000 Scrap

amulets.name: Decayed Margin
amulets.description: Melee hits gain 1.5% base damage dealt as Lifesteal. For each 25% missing Health, gain 1.5% additional Melee Lifesteal. When Health is full, gain 25% Melee Damage.
amulets.unlock: Buy it from Cass (RNG)

amulets.name: Detonation Trigger
amulets.description: Increases Explosion damage by 25%. Explosions apply 405 BURNING damage over 5s.
amulets.unlock: In a giant piston there is a hole, crouch and go underneath to get in the hole before it hits you. Go inside this tunnel to the end of it, you'll find Amulet item near a cliff.

amulets.name: Effigy Pendant
amulets.description: While Grey Healt is presetn, gain 15% to all damage dealt, 10% damage reduction and 1 addional hit before Grey Health is removed.
amulets.unlock: You will need to access a secret passage to find a wooden box, inside it there will be the amulet.

amulets.name: Effluvium Enhancer
amulets.description: Increases ACID damage by 20% and CORROSIVE damage by 50%.
amulets.unlock: Buy at the Drzyr Replicator. 15 Iron, 1000 Scrap

amulets.name: Energized Neck Coil
amulets.description: Increases Status Effect damage by 25%. Applying a damaging Status Effect creates a 5m Explosion for 20% of the Status Effects full damage.

amulets.name: Energy Diverter
amulets.description: While a SHIELD is active, gain 10 Critical Chance and 15% to all damage dealt.
amulets.unlock: Buy at the Drzyr Replicator. 15 Forged Iron, 1000 Scrap

amulets.name: Escalation Protocol
amulets.description: Increases all damage dealt by 2.5% for 10s after killing an enemy. Stacks 10x. Dealing damage refreshes the timer.

amulets.name: Full Moon Circlet
amulets.description: Ranged damage Lifesteals 3% of base damage dealt. At full health, damage is increases by 20%.
amulets.unlock: Inside a hidden room below a pitfall trap

amulets.name: Hyper Conductor
amulets.description:
Gain double Skill Charges. Increases Skill Cooldowns by 50% and reduces Max Power Generation by 15%.
For Heavy Weapons, doubles Heavy Weapon Ammo instead.
amulets.unlock: During the Train event just before ascending the ladder, there will be some canisters to the left of the ladder, shoot them to open a hole. Crouch through it to get the amulet.

amulets.name: Insulation Driver
amulets.description: While BULWARK is active, gain 15% to all damage dealt and HASTE.
amulets.unlock: Inside a room you will find a terminal. Using it will start the Flooded Room Event. The room will fill with water, so climb up to not drown. While you climb you will see the amulet.

amulets.name: Jester's Bell
amulets.description: Increases Mod and Skill Cast Speed by 35%. Casting a Skill or Mod increases all damage by 20% for 15s.
amulets.unlock: While the Jester is making his performance use the Clap Emote.

amulets.name: Kinetic Shield Exchanger
amulets.description: While a SHIELD is active, gain 25% Mod damage and generate 15% additional Mod power.

amulets.name: Kuri Kuri Charm
amulets.description: For every 10% of Health missing (Max 50%), gain 10% increased Relic Use Speed and 7% chance to not consume a Relic Charge.
amulets.location: The Far Woods / The Forbidden Grove / The Withering Weald
amulets.unlock: In the bird's nest. Go around the map until he flies away.

amulets.name: Navigator's Pendant
amulets.description: Grants 20 Health, 20 Stamina, and -10 Armor Encumbrance.
amulets.unlock: Chose to live forever while wearing the Rusted Navigator's Pendant at the world boss

amulets.name: Neckbone Necklace
amulets.description: Reduces the Damage of Status Effects applied to wearer by 50%. Gain 25% increased Damage when suffering from a Status Effect or Blight.
amulets.unlock:
After using the Ravenous Medallion to open the locked door, you will find a lonely creature sitting on a table filled with rotten food. This will bestow the RAVENOUS status effect on your character.
He will ask you to take part on the feast. Eat any meal served, and the event will begin. Fae of many types will spawn in the room and you will have to defeat them.
Once you are done with the Fae waves, the event ends and the host regains consciousness.

amulets.name: Necklace of Flowing Life
amulets.description: Increases Grey Health conversion by an additional 100%. When Grey Health Conversion triggers, gain 5x the amount as Mod Power.

amulets.name: Necklace of Supremacy
amulets.description: After 7s of not being damaged, increases all damage dealt by 15%. Incrfases to 25% if Health is full.
amulets.unlock: Do the first phase of Root Nexus without receiving damage.

amulets.name: Nightweaver's Grudge
amulets.description: Gain 20% Critical Chance and HASTE when within 15m of an entity suffering from a Status Effect.
amulets.unlock: Give the Kolket's Razor (found in Yaesha) to the Nightweaver's Web.

amulets.name: Nimue's Ribbon
amulets.description: Increase Relic Healing Effectiveness by 50% Activating a Relic grants HASTE for 25s.
amulets.unlock: Crafted at Nimue with Golden Ribbon and Silver Ribbon.

amulets.name: One True King Sigil
amulets.description: Increases Mod damage by 20%. Enhances the effect of Faerin's Sigil and Faelin's Sigil by 50% per Sigil equipped.
amulets.unlock: Crafted at Nimue with Faelin's Sigil and Faerin's Sigil.

amulets.name: One-Eyed Joker Idol
amulets.description: Neutral Backdash creates a Magic Card lasting 1s. If Card absorbs enemy damage gain 25% Critical Chance for 5s. Neutral Backdash cost 30% additional Stamina.
amulets.unlock: Need more testing but... In the Jester Card Event check the cards, if there is no joker choose the wrong answer untill it appears.

amulets.name: Range Finder
amulets.description: After killing an enemy, gain 10% Ranged damage and 2m Firearm Range. Stacks 3x Lasts 10s. ranged Weakspot Hits will refresh duration.
amulets.unlock: Crafted at Drzyr Replicator. 15 Galvanized Iron, 1000 Scrap

amulets.name: Ravager's Mark
amulets.description: Increases all damage dealt to BLEEDING targets by 20%. Bonus increases to 30% for targets with 50% or lower Health.
amulets.unlock: Kill The Doe

amulets.name: Red Doe Sigil
amulets.description: Increases Relic Healing Effectiveness by 30% which doubles when the wearer's Health is below 50%.
amulets.unlock: Return the Ornate Lockbox to Her Majesty.

amulets.name: Shaed Bloom Crystal
amulets.description: Gain a 30% damage bonus. Every 5s, the bonus switches between Physical and Elemental damage.
amulets.unlock: After you encounter the Jester the second time it will leave this amulet in the first location encounter.

amulets.name: Shock Device
amulets.description: Increases SHOCK damage by 20% and OVERLOADED damage by 50%.
amulets.unlock: In the basement of the Asylum, enter the first room on the right. Crouch through a small gap. You will find a note and the amulet.

amulets.name: Silver Ribbon
amulets.description: Increases Skill damage by 25%. Activating a SKILL grants HASTE for 15s.
amulets.unlock: While the outside plate is in "dark form" use the Plain Ribbon on the statue. Leave the location and return to get the amulet.

amulets.name: Toxic Release Valve
amulets.description:
Swapping off an empty Firearm releases a Toxic Cloud, which deals 148.5 ACID Damage to all enemies within 7m. and applies CORROSION. 
Can only happen once every 3s.
amulets.unlock: Inside the locked door, you will need the key that is in the secret area. In your path thorugh the dungeon there is a railing that is missing a piece, if you fall off you will land on some tubes that lead to a passage, follow it and you will find it at a room.

amulets.name: Twisted Idol
amulets.description: Increases Armor Effectiveness by 30% and reduces Encumbrance by 15.
amulets.unlock: Buy it from Cass (RNG)

amulets.name: Vengeance Idol
amulets.description: Increases all damage dealt by 30% when the wearer's Health is below 50%.

amulets.name: Void Idol
amulets.description: Increases Reload Speed by 20%. Reloads only require 50% of magazine from reserves to fully reload.
amulets.unlock: Crafted at Drzyr Replicator. Shinning Essence Echo (Dropped by Tal Ratha both forms, 15 Hardened Iron, 1000 Scrap

amulets.name: Downward Spiral
amulets.description: Increase Fire Rate by 10% and Melee Attack Speed by 15%. For every missing 10% of Max Health, gain 3% Ranged Damage (Max 15%) and 4% Melee Damage (Max 20%).
amulets.unlock: Once you make it to the bottom and finish the race, go back to the top. You will see a purple dot on the map. Go back to the spot where you had to shoot the orbs to progress but do not jump down the hole. Look towards the purple dot on the map and aim upwards. You will see the item. Shoot it and you will get the amulet.

amulets.name: Leto's Amulet
amulets.description: Reduces Encumbrance by 40% and Stamina Cost by 15%.
amulets.unlock: Buy it from Reggie after 100 flops. Use some heavy armor to make you flop instead of rolling.

amulets.name: Nightmare Spiral
amulets.description: Gain 10% of base Ranged damage dealt as Lifesteal. Reduces Healing Effectiveness by 95%.
amulets.unlock: Buy from Reggie after finishing 30 Worlds, inlcuding adventure ones.

amulets.name: Onyx Pendulum
amulets.description: Firearm damage adds stacks which increase the damage of stowed firearm by 2.5% for 15s. Stacks 10x.
amulets.unlock: Buy it from Reggie after Nightmare Difficulty Playthrough

amulets.name: Stalker's Brand
amulets.description: Gain 10% Ranged and 15% Melee damage. Bonus doubles versus enemies not targeting wearer.

rings.name: Bisected Ring
rings.description: Gain Infinite Stamina. All damage received is increased by 25%.
rings.unlock: Become Ford

rings.name: Worn Admiral's Ring
rings.description: All Damage received is increased by 200%. All damage dealt is increased by 10%.
rings.unlock: Buy from Reggie at Ward 13 for 500 Scrap

rings.name: Fire Stone
rings.description: Increases FIRE damage by 10% and FIRE Resistance by 15.
rings.unlock: Buy from Reggie at Ward 13 for 500 Scrap

rings.name: Acid Stone
rings.description: Increases ACID damage by 10% and ACID Resistance by 15%.
rings.unlock: Buy from Reggie at Ward 13 for 500 Scrap

rings.name: Grounding Stone
rings.description: Increases SHOCK damage by 10% and SHOCK Resistance by 15
rings.unlock: Buy from Reggie at Ward 13 for 500 Scrap

rings.name: Anastajia's Inspiration
rings.description: When receiven healing effects, gain HASTE for 10s.
rings.unlock: Buy from Whispers

rings.name: Gunslinger's Ring
rings.description: Increases Firearm Swap Speed by 30% and Reload Speed by 10%.
rings.unlock: Exahust dialog of Mudtooth

rings.name: Blood Jewel
rings.description: Charged Melee Attacks apply BLEEDING, dealing 368 BLEED damage over 20s.
rings.unlock: Behind a Waterfall

rings.name: Feedback Loop
rings.description: Perfect Dodge triggers a 3m AOE blast that deal 62 SHOCK Damage and applies OVERLOADED.
rings.location: Tower of the Unseen / Terminus Station

rings.name: Stone of Expanse
rings.description: Increases Ranged damage by 12%. Reduces all other damage dealt by 6%.
rings.unlock: Found on a corpse

rings.name: Deep Pocket Ring
rings.description: Increases Ammo Reserves by 25%
rings.unlock: Found on a corpse

rings.name: Hardcore Metal Band
rings.description: Taking damage adds 1 stack of BULWARK which individually falls off after 10s. Max 5 stacks.

rings.name: Constant Variable Ring
rings.description: Increases Ranged damage up to 20% based on curren Weapon's Overheat value.

rings.name: Low Yield Recovery Ring
rings.description: Killing an enemy regenerates 5% Max Health over 5s. Additional kills increase duration by 5s. Max 30s.
rings.unlock: Found on a corpse

rings.name: Stone of Continuance
rings.description: Increases Skill Duration by 25%.
rings.unlock: Found at the bottom of the tower

rings.name: Reserve Boosting Gem
rings.description: Increases Health Regeneration by 0.333 per second. 1s after going below 50% Health, increases regeneration value to 2 per second until 50% Health is reached.

rings.name: Conservation Seal
rings.description: For every 10% Health missing [Max 50%], gain 3% chance to not consume Relic and 5% increased Relic Efficacy on next use.

rings.name: Guardian's Ring
rings.description: Adds 1 Stack of BULWARK when within 7m of an enemy. Increases to 2 Stacks for 10s after taking Melee damage.
rings.location: Forgotten Field / The Expanding Glade / The Nameless Nest / Faithless Thicket

rings.name: Soul Link
rings.description: Summons Lifesteal 5% of base damage dealt which returns to the wearer as Health.
rings.location: The Expanding Glade / The Withering Weald / The Nameless Nest

rings.name: Targeting Jewel

items.name: Navigator's Helm
items.unlock: Kill a rare N'Erud Zombie (Navigator Zombie) who's wearing the Navigator Helm.

items.name: Faelin
items.unlock: Outside the big door there is a plate with a lever in the middle where you need to insert 2 masks. When you pull the lever will be transported to Beatific or Malefic Gallery. For Faelin you need to be in the Beatific.

items.name: Faerin
items.unlock: Outside the big door there is a plate with a lever in the middle where you need to insert 2 masks. When you pull the lever will be transported to Beatific or Malefic Gallery. For Faerin you need to be in the Malefic.

items.name: Nightweaver (Normal)
items.unlock: Defeat her normally.

items.name: Nightweaver (Heart Kill)
items.unlock: This is easier done in the first phase. When she summons minions she will have in her chest a bright spot, that's her Heart, destroy it and defeat her.

items.name: Sha'Hala (Spectral)
items.unlock: Interact just with the terminal to defeat the Spectral form of Sha'hala.

items.name: Sha'Hala (Physical)
items.unlock: Before interacting with the terminal use the Override Pin in the hole the terminal has, after that defeat the Physical form of Sha'hala. This will cause your N'Erud world ends so make sure you have collected everything beforehand.

items.name: Tal'Ratha (Physical)
items.unlock: When you talk to him refuse to be eaten. It won't be that obvious but the dialog will be in that line. After that defeat him.

items.name: Tal'Ratha (Metaphysical)
items.unlock: When you talk to him let him eat you. It won't be that obvious but the dialog will be in that line. After that defeat him.

items.name: Corruptor (Guardian Kill)
items.unlock: Defeat The Corruptor when at least you kill one time the Guardian.

items.name: Corruptor (No Guardian Kill)
items.unlock: Defeat The Corruptor but don't kill Guardian, not even once.

items.name: Corrupted Ravager 1
items.unlock: The Ravager will ask you to kill the Doe. Shoot the Ravager to start the fight and then kill the Doe before he does.

items.name: Corrupted Ravager 2
items.unlock: The Ravager will ask you to kill the Doe. Shoot the Ravager to start the fight, be carefull to not kill the Doe midfight, after that at some point of the fight the Ravager will eat the Doe.

items.name: Corrupted Ravager 3
items.unlock: Kill the Doe when The Ravager asks to kill it.

items.name: Corrupted Ravager 4
items.unlock: Heal the Doe when The Ravager asks to kill it.

items.name: Labyrinth Sentinel
items.unlock: Shoot the white squares on the cubes. When you hit all the white squares of a cube it stops having purple light around it.

items.name: Annihilation
items.unlock: Defeat Annihilation
